name: Tree-Umph
description:
Did you ever wish you could climb that one particular enticing tree? Now is your time!  No one can stop you now. Climb that tree, get that to that bird's nest!

Oh and don't forget to manipulate time itself to reach your goal.

Made by:

Programmer:

  • Gillian Assi 
  • Ruben Frans
  • Jonas Bruylant

Animations:

  • Noa Plinke

Art:

  • Christiane Schaper
  • Sarah Feldmann

Tree-Umph is the result of a local 3 day game-jam hosted by DAE Howest. The goal is to reach the top of the tree without falling off. For certain obstacles you have to use wall jumps and time-shenanigans to succeed. 

Good luck on your way up the tree and thank you for checking out our small project.

Post-Game Jam Updates:

  • You are now able to use the menu buttons with your controller
  • Keyboard bind for movement: WASD / Arrowkeys, Spacebar for jumping
  • Keyboard bind for the special ability: E
  • Able to go back to the main menu by pressing "escape" on your keyboard or "start button" on controllers
  • Some minor positioning adjustments for spawners
  • The main Character has textured eyes now!

Although keyboard control is possible, we advise to use a controller instead for the optimal experience.

Since we had a few requests for an option to reset your run, we implemented a pause menu in which you can restart your run, which will restart your timer. Good luck speedrunning!
